summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LocaTrack Chat and Payments modules. All features are working correctly: Chat module supports conversation creation, message sending/receiving, and multi-tenant isolation. Payments module supports full CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete). Both locateur and employee roles can access their tenant's data correctly.
passed_tests: Locateur login with testlocateur2@test.com / Test1234!
Employee login with employee1@test.com / Emp1234!
GET /api/messages/users - Locateur sees only their employees
GET /api/messages/users - Employee sees locateur and other employees of same tenant
GET /api/messages/conversations - Returns conversations for current user
POST /api/messages/conversations - Creates new conversation between users
POST /api/messages/send - Sends message in conversation
GET /api/messages/conversations/{id} - Returns messages in conversation
GET /api/messages/unread-count - Returns unread message count
GET /api/payments - Returns payments for tenant
POST /api/payments - Creates new payment
PUT /api/payments/{id} - Updates existing payment
DELETE /api/payments/{id} - Deletes payment
Employee can view and manage payments (same tenant)
Multi-tenant isolation for payments verified
Multi-tenant isolation for chat users verified
Messages page UI - WhatsApp-style layout working
Messages page UI - New conversation dialog working
Messages page UI - Message sending working
Messages page UI - Bidirectional chat working
Payments page UI - Payment cards displayed correctly
Payments page UI - Add payment dialog working
Payments page UI - Edit payment dialog working
Payments page UI - Delete button present
Payments page UI - Total amount card displayed
seed_data_creation: Test payments and messages created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Chat and Payments modules fully tested and working. Test credentials: locateur (testlocateur2@test.com / Test1234!), employee (employee1@test.com / Emp1234!). Test contract ID: 91001fca-88c6-4555-94b6-e710b9297148. Multi-tenant isolation verified for both modules.
